scripts.start: yarn build:package:all && yarn concurrently --raw --kill-others "yarn start:api" "yarn start:gauzy"
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 yarn build:package:all && yarn concurrently --raw --kill-others "yarn start:api:prod" "yarn start:gauzy:prod"
